quests:
1️⃣ First Steps: Spread Positivity! 🌸
Say 5 positive words in chat to earn chi!
**Reward:** 50 chi

2️⃣ Create Your Garden 🪷
Use `P!creategarden` to start your chi farming journey!
**Reward:** 100 chi

3️⃣ Join the Team Spirit 🐼
Create a team with `P!createteam` or join one with `P!jointeam`!
**Reward:** 150 chi

4️⃣ Challenge a Friend ⚔️
Start your first duel with `P!duel @user`!
**Reward:** 200 chi

5️⃣ Upgrade Your Team Base 🏠
Add a decoration to your team base with `P!base decorate`!
**Reward:** 300 chi

6️⃣ Grow Your Garden 🎋
Upgrade your garden tier with `P!garden upgrade`!
**Reward:** 400 chi

7️⃣ Claim an Artifact ✨
Find and claim an artifact when one spawns with `P!find artifact`!
**Reward:** 500 chi

8️⃣ Make a Trade 🤝
Trade chi or artifacts with another user using `P!trade`!
**Reward:** 600 chi

9️⃣ Defeat a Boss 🐉
Complete a team boss battle with `P!teamboss`!
**Reward:** 800 chi

🔟 Tutorial Master 🏆
Complete all 9 tutorial quests above!
**Reward:** 1000 chi
